headline: I Made yet Another Rick Roll Link Generator â€“ Instant Rick Roll
description:
Hey there -- thought I'd show this simple app off. I'm bad at rails/html/css/js but made a Rick Roll generator in just under a day with rails!

It's kind of incredible how relevant the rick roll still is after ~15 years.

Any generated Links Dynamically make opengraph tags to disguise themselves as whatever the user inputs.

It's been pretty fun to see people making their own Rick Roll links. Everyone wants to make a million dollar SaaS app but making dumb little apps like this is something I might do more of!
